all_findings.title: Missing Access Control on Minting Function
all_findings.description: Function `mint()` is minting without access control modifiers. Any caller can invoke this function. NFTBTC C001/H001/H002: Add onlyOwner, onlyAdmin, or role-based access control.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add modifier to function declaration: `function mint(...) external onlyOwner {...}`

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Missing Access Control on Burning Function
all_findings.description: Function `burn()` is burning without access control modifiers. Any caller can invoke this function. NFTBTC C001/H001/H002: Add onlyOwner, onlyAdmin, or role-based access control.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add modifier to function declaration: `function burn(...) external onlyOwner {...}`

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Unchecked Fund Transfer: Token transfer
all_findings.description: Line 49: Token transfer without proper verification. Missing balance check: True, Missing receiver validation: True. DAO funds can be drained to arbitrary address.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add require(recipient != address(0)) and require(balance >= amount) before transfer

attack_vectors.description: Reentrancy vulnerability combined with fund transfer

all_findings.title: Unvalidated Fund Receiver
all_findings.description: Function `testApprove()` transfers funds to user-supplied receiver without validation. Attacker can redirect funds to arbitrary address. Receiver variable: from

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add: require(from != address(0), 'Invalid receiver'); validate receiver is trusted address

all_findings.title: Missing nonReentrant Modifier on testMint()
all_findings.description: Function makes external calls or transfers ETH but lacks nonReentrant modifier. External calls: 0, ETH transfers: 0. This function should have reentrancy protection.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add `nonReentrant` modifier from OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard. Import: `import '@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol';` Usage: `function testMint(...) external nonReentrant { ... }`

attack_vectors.description: Reentrancy vulnerability combined with fund transfer

all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- function testFailPermitBadDeadline(
-         uint256 privateKey,
-         address to,
-         uint256 amount,
-         uint256 deadline
-     ) public {
-         if (deadline < block.timestamp) deadline = block.timestamp;
-         if (privateKey == 0) privateKey = 1;
- 
-         address owner = hevm.addr(privateKey);
- 
-         (uint8 v, bytes32 r, bytes32 s) = hevm.sign(
-             privateKey,
-             keccak256(
-                 abi.encodePacked(
-                     "\x19\x01",
-                     token.DOMAIN_SEPARATOR(),
-                     keccak256(abi.encode(PERMIT_TYPEHASH, owner, to, amount, 0, deadline))
-                 )
-             )
-         );
- 
-         token.permit(owner, to, amount, deadline + 1, v, r, s);
-     }
+ function testFailPermitBadDeadline(
+         uint256 privateKey,
+         address to,
+         uint256 amount,
+         uint256 deadline
+     ) public {
+         require(to != address(0), "Zero address not allowed");
+         if (deadline < block.timestamp) deadline = block.timestamp;
+         if (privateKey == 0) privateKey = 1;
+ 
+         address owner = hevm.addr(privateKey);
+ 
+         (uint8 v, bytes32 r, bytes32 s) = hevm.sign(
+             privateKey,
+             keccak256(
+                 abi.encodePacked(
+                     "\x19\x01",
+                     token.DOMAIN_SEPARATOR(),
+                     keccak256(abi.encode(PERMIT_TYPEHASH, owner, to, amount, 0, deadline))
+                 )
+             )
+         );
+ 
+         token.permit(owner, to, amount, deadline + 1, v, r, s);
+     }

all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- function testFailPermitPastDeadline(
-         uint256 privateKey,
-         address to,
-         uint256 amount,
-         uint256 deadline
-     ) public {
-         deadline = bound(deadline, 0, block.timestamp - 1);
-         if (privateKey == 0) privateKey = 1;
- 
-         address owner = hevm.addr(privateKey);
- 
-         (uint8 v, bytes32 r, bytes32 s) = hevm.sign(
-             privateKey,
-             keccak256(
-                 abi.encodePacked(
-                     "\x19\x01",
-                     token.DOMAIN_SEPARATOR(),
-                     keccak256(abi.encode(PERMIT_TYPEHASH, owner, to, amount, 0, deadline))
-                 )
-             )
-         );
- 
-         token.permit(owner, to, amount, deadline, v, r, s);
-     }
+ function testFailPermitPastDeadline(
+         uint256 privateKey,
+         address to,
+         uint256 amount,
+         uint256 deadline
+     ) public {
+         require(to != address(0), "Zero address not allowed");
+         deadline = bound(deadline, 0, block.timestamp - 1);
+         if (privateKey == 0) privateKey = 1;
+ 
+         address owner = hevm.addr(privateKey);
+ 
+         (uint8 v, bytes32 r, bytes32 s) = hevm.sign(
+             privateKey,
+             keccak256(
+                 abi.encodePacked(
+                     "\x19\x01",
+                     token.DOMAIN_SEPARATOR(),
+                     keccak256(abi.encode(PERMIT_TYPEHASH, owner, to, amount, 0, deadline))
+                 )
+             )
+         );
+ 
+         token.permit(owner, to, amount, deadline, v, r, s);
+     }
